name: International Art Museum of America
description: Art museum featuring paintings and precious art by world-renowned artists from 12 countries. Free admission. Open Wed-Sun 10am-5pm.
fullDescription: Art museum featuring paintings and precious art by world-renowned artists from 12 countries. Free admission. Open Wed-Sun 10am-5pm.
keywords: International Art Museum, IAMA, San Francisco, free museum, world art, paintings, Market Street
